summary: A young man invents a robot dog that has super strength, x-ray vision and can detect crimes being committed. A greedy businessman tries to steal the invention from him.
cast: Wesley Eure|Valerie Bertinelli|Conrad Bain|Chuck McCann|Red Buttons|Larry Bishop|Hermione Baddeley|Jim Backus|Robert Q. Lewis|Austin Willis|William Flatley|Dinah Anne Rogers|James Reynolds|Joe Baker|Phil Adams|Paul Nuckles|Baynes Barron|Steve Mitchell|Peter Griffin|Larry Easley|Michael Rougas|Joe Hornok|Sheldon Konblett|Joe Ross|Regis Toomey|Don Messick
keywords: robot|robot dog|dog|x ray vision|animated opening credits
title: C.H.O.M.P.S. El super perro
